definitions.definition: to run as fast as you can over a short distance, either in a race or because you are in a great hurry to get somewhere:
examples: We had to sprint to catch the bus.

definitions.definition: a short and very fast race, such as the 100 metres, or the last part of a longer race that is run as fast as possible:
a very fast run that someone makes when they are in a great hurry to get somewhere:
examples: He suddenly broke into (= started) a sprint.
